Peter is a married father of one and lives in Likoni, Kenya. He owns a transport business that has been in operation for two years. 

After being introduced to Milango by his friends, Peter is applying for a loan of 80,000 KES to carry out car repairs. He aspires to own a fleet of vehicles and also expand his business to other regions.

He will use the extra income from this loan to digitalize his office, which serves as the base for all his operations.

loans.use: To to carry out repairs on his car.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Munga

texts.en:
Munga is a resident of Mombasa, Kenya. He is married and has three children. Munga owns a clothes business which has been running for one year. He is also a milk supplier. He was introduced to Milango by his friends.

He is applying for a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to purchase more clothes and milk for sale. He looks forward to owning a premise from where he can sell milk and clothes despite the challenge of some clients not paying on time. Munga will use the extra income from this loan to pay for school fees.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes and milk for sale.

loans.name: Habil

texts.ru: Habil uje 11 let kak rabotatyet taxistom. Etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyego starshego brata kotoriy toje rabotayet taxistom. Seychas mashina Habil isportilas i on ne mojet rabotat, poetomu on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit zapchasti i pochinit svoyu mashinu. Habil 42 qoda.  On jenat i imeyet 3 detey. Habil yavlyayetsya IDP personom pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey jenoy i detmi.
texts.en:
Habil has been working as a taxi driver for eleven years. He has learned this business from his oldest brother who also works as a taxi driver. Right now Habil's car has broken down and cannot work, and this is why he needs 2000 AZN to buy spare parts and fix the car.

Habil is 42 years old, married and has three children. Habil is an internally displaced person relocated from the town of Fuzuli and now living in the Fuzuli region together with his wife and children.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for the car.

loans.name: Talbak

texts.ru: Талбак целеустремленный и добрый человек. Он ответственный муж и имеет четверых детей. Более 12 лет он занимается скотоводством. Он любит свой бизнес и ему нравится ухаживать за скотом. Раньше он занимался услугами такси в своем городе. Талбак хочет улучшить жилищные условия и дать хорошее образование  своим детям. Талбак хотел бы получить займ в размере 11000 Сомони для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарен вам за поддержку.
texts.en:
Talbak is a focused and kind person. He is a responsible husband and has four children. For over 12 years, he has been raising cattle. He loves his business and enjoys caring for the animals. Previously, he provided taxi services in his city.

Talbak would like to improve his children's living conditions and provide them with good education. He would like to receive a loan of 11000 somoni in order to purchase more cattle and expand his business. He hopes for your help and thanks you in advance for your support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Sherozkhuja

texts.ru: Шерозхуджа более 8 лет занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. Он семьянин. Жена домохозяйка. Имеет на содержании двоих детей. Он выращивает на 2 га земли  картошку и на 3 га земли пшеницу. На отходы выращенных  сельхозкультур откармливает скот. Он хочет получить займ в размере 2100$ США для покупки минеральных удобрений и обработки земли . Он хочет к весне закупить также семена. Он надеется на новог8одний подарок с вашей стороны, одобрение займа. Спасибо
texts.en: Sherozkhuja has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over eight years.  He is a family man. His wife is a homemaker.  Sherozkhuja is raising two children.  He grows potatoes on two hectares of land and wheat on three hectares of land.  He uses the leftovers from the crops to feed livestock.  Sherozkhuja hopes to obtain a loan in the sum of $2100 for the purchase of mineral fertilizers for treating the land.  He also wants to purchase seeds for the spring.  He hopes to receive an approval of his loan request as a New Year's present from you.  Thank you!

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Rustamjon

texts.ru: Рустамджон трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и ответственный отец четверых детей. Чтобы обеспечить свою семью Рустамджон выбрал для себя выгодную и прибыльную работу. Он занимается скотоводством более 6 лет и имеет хороший опыт. Рустамджон  хочет расширить свой бизнес и получить хорошую прибыль. Все ее доходы тратит на обеспечение своих детей. Рустамджон запрашивает займ в размере 1500$ США для покупки скота с целью продвижения деятельности и увлечения оборотного капитала.
texts.en: Rustamjon is a hard-working man.  He is married and the responsible father of four children.  In order to provide for his family, Rustamjon has chosen a lucrative and profitable work.  He has been working in animal husbandry for over six years and is very experienced.  Rustamjon wants to expand his business and make a good profit.  All his income is spent to provide for his children.  Rumstamjon is requesting a loan in the amount of 1,500 USD to purchase livestock in order to boost his activity and increase his working capital.

loans.use: To buy cattle.

loans.name: Avaz

texts.ru: Аваз женат, ему 40 лет. На воспитании имеет троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством, а он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. Он продает полученный урожай за выгодную цену, он выращивает арбуз, лук, картошку и люцерну. Он начал свой бизнес десять лет назад с купли продажи мелкого рогатого скота. В данный момент имеет дехканское хозяйство. Его семья очень дружная и помогает по бизнесу. Аваз хотел бы получить займ в размере 8500 Сомони для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений и мелкого рогатого скота.
texts.en: Avaz is 41 years old, married and is raising three children.  His wife is involved in household work, and he is involved in growing agricultural crops.  Avaz sells his harvest at a profitable price.  He grows watermelons, onions, potatoes and alfalfa.  He started his business ten years ago with buying and selling small livestock.  Currently, Avaz has a dekhan farm.  His family is very friendly and help him with the business.  Avaz wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 8500 Somoni for the purchase of seeds, mineral fertilizers and small livestock.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, mineral fertilizers and small livestock

loans.name: Bahromjon

texts.ru: Бахромджон перспективный молодой человек. Он женат, имеет одного ребенка. Для содержания своей семьи в хороших условиях он начал заниматься скотоводством 2 года назад. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Бахромджон хочет расширить свой бизнес и увеличить свою прибыль для улучшения жилищных условий семьи. С этой целью он хотел бы получить займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Bahromjon is a promising young man.  He is married and has one child.  In order to provide good conditions for his family, he became involved in animal husbandry two years ago.  His wife is a homemaker.  Bahromjon wants to expand his business and increase his profit in order to improve his family's living conditions.  To achieve this goal, he is requesting a loan in the sum of 5000 Somoni to purchase livestock.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Mahmud

texts.ru: Махмуд женат и ответственный отец двоих детей. Он трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Более 10 лет Махмуд занимается предоставлением услуги такси. Жена медсестра работает в городской больнице. Махмуд запрашивает займ в размере 6000 Сомони для покупки шин, чтобы поменять на зимний период. А остальную сумму хочет использовать на ремонт автомобиля. Он надеется на вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Mahmud is married and is a responsible father of two children.  He is a hardworking and goal-oriented person.  Mahmud has been involved in proving a taxi service for over ten years.  His wife is a nurse, who works at the city hospital.  Mahmud is requesting a loan in the sum of 6000 Somoni to purchase tires, in order to replace them for the winter period.  He wants to use the rest of the loan to make repairs to his vehicle.  He relies on your help and support.

loans.use: to purchase tires and make repairs to his vehicle

loans.name: Nuriddin

texts.ru: Нуриддин женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством и воспитанием детей. Нуриддин занимается перевозкой пассажиров. Недавно купил собственную автомашину марки "Газель". На данный момент ему нужно отремонтировать кузовную часть автомобиля. С этой целью он запрашивает займ  в размере 1000$ США.
texts.en: Nuriddin is married and is responsible father of three children.  His wife is involved in household work and raising the children.  Nuriddin is involved in passenger transportation.  He recently purchased his own "Gazel" vehicle.  Currently, he needs to make repairs to the body of the vehicle.  This is why he is requesting a loan in the sum of $1000.

loans.use: to make repairs to his vehicle

loans.name: Rahmatali

texts.ru: Рахматали женат и имеет четверых детей. Он целеустремленный и трудолюбивый человек. Более 7 лет Рахматали занимается купле- продажей сухофруктов. В основном он покупает сухие фрукты у населения, а затем обрабатывает их и продает на местном базаре. Жена помогает по бизнесу, иногда дети. Рахматали запрашивает займ для покупки сухофруктов для перепродажи, а на остальную сумму хочет купить мелкий и крупный рогатый скот. На полученный доход от займа хочет расширить свой бизнес. Рахматали надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарен вам за вашу доброту и милосердие.
texts.en: Rahmatali is married with four children. He's a dedicated and hard-working man. He's been selling dried fruit for more than seven years. He buys the dried fruit publicly and then packages it for sale at local markets. His wife helps him out, and sometimes his children do, too. He is seeking a loan to purchase dried fruit to resell. He wants to use the rest of his loan to to buy short-horned and long-horned cattle and use the income to expand his business. Rahmatali needs your help and thanks you in advance for your goodness and loving-kindness.

loans.use: to buy dried fruits and cattle.

loans.name: Abdukhalil

texts.ru: Более 20 лет Абдухалил занимается откармливанием скота. Он женат и имеет четверых детей. С годами он старается улучшить свои жилищные условия и расширяет свой бизнес. Кроме скотоводства Абдухалил занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Полученный урожай он продает на рынке, а также тратит на содержание семьи. Отходы  культур  идут на корм скота. Абдухалил хотел бы получить займ в размере 6000 Сомони для покупки 3 голов крупного и 3 голов мелкого рогатого скота. А остальную сумму хочет использовать на покупку семян пшеницы и ячменя для посева. Он надеется на вашу доброту и помощь.
texts.en: Abdukhalil has been involved in fattening up livestock for over 20 years.  He is married and has four children.  Over the years, he has tried to improve his living conditions and expand his business.  Besides animal husbandry, Abdukhalil is also involved in growing agricultural crops.  He sells his harvest at a market and also spends on supporting his family.  He uses the leftovers from the crops to feed livestock.  Abdukhalil wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 6000 Somoni to purchase three heads of cattle and three heads of small livestock.  He wants to use the rest of the sum to purchase wheat and barley seeds for sowing.  He relies on your kindness and help.

loans.use: to buy livestock and seeds

loans.name: Kuvonj

texts.ru: Кувондж трудолюбивый и честный семьянин. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 20 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. За эти долгие годы он изучил свой бизнес хорошо и сейчас успешно продолжает его. Кроме того Кувондж имеет скот и откармливает их за счет отходов выращенных сельхозкультур. Он запрашивает займ для покупки 4 голов крупного рогатого скота и 5 голов мелкого рогатого скота, а на остальную часть хочет купить семена пшеницы и ячменя для посева. Он надеется на вашу помощь и великодушие.
texts.en: Kuvonj is a hardworking and honest family man.  He is married and is raising three children.  He has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over 20 years.  He learned his business well over this many years and now successfully continues it.  Besides this, Kuvonj has livestock and fattens it up by using leftovers from growing agricultural crops.  He is requesting this loan for the purchase of four heads of cattle and five heads of small livestock, and the purchase of wheat and barley seeds for sowing.  He relies on your help and generosity.

loans.use: to buy livestock and seeds

loans.name: Saidullo

texts.ru: Сайдулло целеустремленный и добрый семьянин. Любящий отец пятерых детей и на иждивении имеет четверых. Его семья большая и требует много расходов. Он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов, часть урожая тратит на содержание семьи, а остальную часть продает за хорошую цену, когда на рынке цены возрастают. В бизнесе помогает жена и дети, таким образом они стараются улучшить благосостояние семьи. Сайдулло хотел бы получить займ в размере 3000$ США для покупки ГСМ, минеральных удобрений и семян.
texts.en: Saidullo is a goal-oriented and kind family man.  He is a loving father of five children and supports four people.  His family is large and requires a lot of expenses.  Saidullo is involved in growing agricultural crops and uses part of the harvest to support the family, and sells the rest at a good price, when prices rise at the market.  His wife and children help him with the business, and together they try to improve the family's welfare.  Saidullo wants to obtain a loan in the sum of $3000 to purchase fuel, mineral fertilizers and seeds.

loans.use: to buy fuel, fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Ismoil

texts.ru: Исмоил женат и имеет троих детей. Он целеустремленный и добросовестный человек. Более 10 лет Исмоил занимается откармливанием скота и выращиванием сельхозкультур. В связи с недостаточностью денежных средств он обращался в «ИМОН Инернешнл» и хотел бы получить займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки 3 голов мелкого рогатого скота. А на остальную сумму хочет купить семена ячменя для посева и этим хочет расширить свой бизнес. Он надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарен вам всем за ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Ismoil is married and has three children.  He is a goal-oriented and conscientious person.  Ismoil has been involved in fattening up livestock and growing agricultural crops for over ten years.  Due to a shortage of monetary funds, he went to "Imon International" and wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 3000 Somoni to purchase three heads of small livestock.  And he wants to use the rest of the sum to buy barley seeds for sowing in order to expand his business.  Ismoil relies on your help and thanks you in advance for your mercy.

loans.use: to buy livestock and seeds

loans.name: Amirkhon

texts.ru: Амирхон молодой, умный и целеустремленный юноша. Он занимается купле- продажей автомобилей. Он любит свое дело, ему нравится работать с автомобилями. Раньше его отец занимался этим делом, а он помогал и теперь более 5 лет он самостоятельно продолжает этот бизнес. Амирхон хотел бы получить займ в размере 2000$ США для покупки автомобиля, для пополнения оборотного капитала. Он надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарен вам за вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Amirkhon is a clever and purposeful young man. He works with purchasing and selling cars. He loves his work, and he likes to work with cars. His father used to work in this business, and Amirkhon helped. Now he has run the business on his own for more than 5 years. 

Amirkhon would like to receive a loan in the amount of 2000 USD for the purchase of a car in order to expand his business. He hopes for your help and thanks you in advance for your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a car in order to expand his business

loans.name: Davlyatmurod

texts.ru: Более 16 лет Давлятмурод занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. Он целеустремленный и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет семерых детей. Жена и дети помогают ему по бизнесу. Каждый год Давлятмурод старается получить хороший урожай, и на данный момент хочет обработать свою землю до предстоящего посева. Он запрашивает займ в размере 2000$ США для покупки ГСМ, минеральных удобрений, семян и прополки. Он надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарен вам за вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: For more than 16 years Davlyatmurod has grown crops.  He is a goal-oriented and hard working man.  He is married and takes care of seven children.  His wife and the children help him with his business.  Every year Davlyatmurod tries to have a good harvest, and at present he wants to till his land before the coming planting.  He is requesting a loan of $2000 to buy fuel and lubricating oils, fertilizer, seed, and herbicide.  He is hoping for your help and is grateful in advance for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seed and fuel

loans.name: Badridin

texts.ru: Бадридин женат и ответственный отец четверых детей. Более 10 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. В основном он выращивает овощи и фруктов, а затем продает на рынке, прибыль  тратит на содержание семьи. Бадридин хочет обработать свою землю для нового посева. С этой целью он запрашивает займ для покупки ГСМ, минеральных удобрений, семян и саженцев. Он надеется вашу помощь и заранее благодарен вам за вашу доброту.
texts.en: Badridin is married, and a responsible father of four children. He has been growing produce for more than 10 years. He mostly grows fruit and vegetables, and then sells them at the market, using the income to support his family. Badridin wants to prepare his land for a new crop, and is requesting a loan for buying seeds, mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants, and seedlings. He looks forward to your assistance and thanks you in advance for your kindness.

loans.use: To buy seeds, mineral fertilizers, fuel and seedlings

loans.name: Abduchabor

texts.ru: Абдучабор женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 15 лет Абдучабор занимается перевозкой пассажиров в своем городе. Он имеет много клиентов и всегда старается хорошо обслужить их. Данный момент Абдучабор хочет отремонтировать свою машину, так как она  нуждается в ремонте. Для этого ему нужно закупить запчасти. С этой целью он запрашивает займ в размере 2500 Сомони. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту. Спасибо вам большое!
texts.en: Abduchabor is married, and a responsible father of three children. His wife is a homemaker. For more than 15 years Abduchabor has been transporting passengers around his city. He has many clients and always tries to provide them with good service. Right now Abduchabor wants to fix his car, which needs repairs. To do this, he needs to purchase spare parts. For this purpose he is requesting a loan for 2,500 Somoni. He looks forward to receiving your assistance and kindness. Thank you very much!

loans.use: To buy spare parts for repair his car

loans.name: Mahmadulo

texts.ru: Махмадуло образованный и честный человек. Он имеет большую дружную семью, его жена и семеро детей. Более 13 лет он занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. После уборки  урожая он продает его за хорошую цену, кроме того он тратит доходы от урожай  на нужды семьи. В бизнесе помогает супруга и старшие дети. Махмадуло хотел бы получить займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки ГСМ, минеральных удобрений, семян и платы труда наемных работников в прополке. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Mahmadulo is an educated and honest man. He has a great friendly family – his wife and seven children. For more than thirteen years he has been engaged in cultivation of agricultural crops. After collecting the harvest he sells it for a good price, and in addition he spends the proceeds of the harvest on the needs of the family. His spouse and children help him in the business. Mahmadulo wants to receive a loan in the amount of 10,000 somoni for the purchase of fuel, fertilizer, seeds, and to pay the employees for weeding. He looks forward to your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy fuel, fertilizer, seeds and pay for weeding.

loans.name: Mastura

texts.ru: Мастура замужем и любящая мать четверых детей, двое из них несовершеннолетние. Мать живет с ними. Более 17 лет она занимается купле- продажей женской одежды на местном рынке. Имеет широкий ассортимент товаров и много постоянных клиентов. Она всегда привозит высококачественные товары, чтобы привлечь много других клиентов. Мастура хотела бы получить займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки новых ассортиментов женской  одежды с целью увлечения оборотного капитала. Мастура надеется на вашу помощь. Она заранее благодарна вам за вашу доброту и милосердие.
texts.en: Mastura is married and is a loving mother of four children, two of whom are adolescents.  Her mother lives with them.  Mastura has been involved in buying and selling women's clothing at the local market for over 17 years.  She has a wide selection of merchandise and many regular customers.  She always brings in high-quality merchandise in order to attract many other customers.  Mastura wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 10,000 Somoni to purchase a new selection of women's clothing in order to increase her working capital.  Mastura relies on your help.  She is grateful to you in advance for your kindness and mercy.

loans.use: to buy new merchandise

loans.name: Barotali

texts.ru: Более 15 лет Баротали занимается выращиваем сельхозпродуктов. Он женат и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Он всегда собирает хороший урожай и продает на рынке. Его супруга и дети помогают ему во время посева, а также в  переработке земли. Баротали хотел бы получить займ в размере 3000$ США для покупки ГСМ, минеральных удобрений, семян и прополку. Он хочет обработать  землю до предстоящего посева. Он надеется на вашу помощь и великодушие.
texts.en: Barotali has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over 15 years.  He is married and is raising five children.  He always collects a good harvest and sells it at a market.  His wife and children help him during the time of sowing and also with treating the land.  Barotali wants to obtain a loan in the sum of $3000 to purchase fuel, mineral fertilizers, seeds and a weeding tool.  He wants to treat the land for the upcoming sowing.  He relies on your help and generosity.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and fuel

loans.name: Valijon

texts.ru: Валиджон женат и любящий отец двоих детей. Его дети еще маленькие. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Валиджон занимается выращиванием и откормом скота более 10 лет. Он вырос в бедной семье дехканина и с детства он привык к  труду. Его трудолюбие помогает ему поставить себя на ноги. Так как он живет в деревне, там нет постоянной работы, все работы сезонные, поэтому он занимается скотоводством. В настоящее время он испытывает серьезные затруднения для построения сарая и запаса корма для скота. Валиджон запрашивает займ в размере 4000 Сомони для покупки скота и корма для них с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Valijon is married and is a loving father of two children.  His children are still little.  His wife is a homemaker.  Valijon has been involved in raising and fattening up livestock for over ten years.  He grew up in a poor family of a dekhan farmer and has been used to work since childhood.  His love of hard work helps him to get himself up on his feet.  Because he lives in a village, there is no permanent work.  All of the work is seasonal, and this is why Valijon is involved in animal husbandry.  Currently, he is experiencing serious difficulties with building a barn and stocking up on animal feed.  Valijon is requesting a loan in the sum of 4000 Somoni to purchase livestock and fodder for it in order to expand his business.  He relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy cattle and animal feed

loans.name: Uktamjon

texts.ru: Уктамджон с детства знаком с работой  скотовода, так как его отец работает пастухом. Он любящий муж и ответственный отец троих детей. Для содержания своей семьи он начал заниматься скотоводством 10 лет тому назад. Таким образом, он успешно продолжает свой бизнес. Уктамджон запрашивает займ в размере 3000 Сомони для увеличения поголовье скота. На  полученную прибыль он хочет выдать свою дочку замуж, а в дальнейшем женить своего сына. Уктамджон надеется на вашу доброту и милосердие.
texts.en: Uktamjon has been involved in animal husbandry since childhood, since his father worked as a herdsman. He is a loving husband and the responsible father of three children. To support his family he began to raise animals 10 years ago. His business has continued successfully. Uktamjon is requesting a loan of 3000 somoni to increase his herd. He wants to use the profit he earns to pay for his daughter's wedding, and later his son's. Uktamjon is trusting in your kindness and generosity.

loans.use: To buy cattle to raise

loans.name: Eshboi

texts.ru: Эшбой женат и ответственный отец троих детей, один из них мигрант в России. Жена домохозяйка. Пять лет назад он начал заниматься скотоводством и имеет богатый опыт. Он хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль. Сейчас он имеет 5 голов крупного рогатого скота и 7 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Эшбой хотел бы получить займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки 14 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en:
Eshboi is married and is the responsible father of three children, one of them a migrant to Russia. His wife is a homemaker. Five years ago, he began to breed cattle and has a wealth of experience. He wants to expand his business to make a good profit. Now he has five heads of cattle and seven sheep and goats.  

Eshboi would like to receive a loan of 5,000 Somoni in order to purchase 14 heads of cattle. He hopes for your help and mercy.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Ismoil

texts.ru: Исмоил добросовестный и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Более трех лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур такие как пшеница, ячмень и лук. Также одновременно занимается скотоводством. Имеет в обороте несколько  голов крупного и 5 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Исмоил хотел бы получить займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений и семян лука. Он надеется на вашу доброту, помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Ismoil is an honest and hardworking man.  He is married and has two children.  For more than three years he has grown crops such as wheat, barley, and onions.  At the same time, he also breeds livestock. His herd numbers several head of large cattle and 5 head of sheep and goats. Ismoil would like to get a loan of 10,000 Somoni (TJS) to buy mineral fertilizer and onion seed.   He is relying on your kindness, help, and charity.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer and onion seed.

loans.name: Abdukhalil

texts.ru: Абдухалил ответственный и добросовестный человек. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Его жена работает в сельском хозяйстве. Абдухалил занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота. А также он занимается выращиванием риса. Отходы от выращивания селхозкультур идут на корм скота. Абдухалил запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений, ГСМ и оплата за аренды земли. Он надеется на вашу помощь и великодушие.
texts.en: Abdukhalil is married with three children. He is a responsible and conscientious person. His wife works in agriculture. Abdukhalil raises and sells cattle. In addition, he grows rice. The remaining harvest materials are used to feed livestock. Abdukhalil requests a loan to buy fertilizer, fuel and payment for the land lease. He looks forward to your help and generosity.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers and fuel

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sheep and bring more meat to his butcher shop.

loans.name: Murad

texts.en:
Murad is 23 years old and has been married for more than a year. He was blessed to have a baby daughter.

Four years ago Murad opened a store to sell water filters and over these years he was able to add more than one type of these filters and add a repair service, too, but now Murad wants to expand his business to cover more areas in Madaba, enlarge the store space, and bring in more types of filters.

loans.use: to enlarge the store space and bring in more types of filters.

loans.name: Arbelia Auxiliadora

texts.es: La Sra. Arbelia   tiene un puesto de abarrotería en el mercado de la capital, ella lleva más de quince años con este tipo de actividad comercial. Es casada con tres hijos los cuales se encuentran en edad escolar. Ella ha trabajado seis préstamos con ceprodel y todos estos han sido para la compra de mercadería para su negocio. Arbelia acude nuevamente a las oficinas de ceprodel para solicitar un nuevo préstamo el cual será invertido para la compra de mercadería para la abarrotería como son productos lácteos, carnes de pollo, res y botería.
texts.en:
Arbelia has grocery store located at the market in the capital, and has more than 15 years of experience with this type of business. She is married with three children who are of school age. Arbelia has worked with six CEPRODEL loans, all of which were used to purchase merchandise for her business. 

Arbelia visited the CEPRODEL office to request a new loan which she will invest in the purchase of grocery products such as dairy, meat, chicken, beef and canned goods.

loans.use: to purchase dairy products, chicken, beef and canned goods for her store.

loans.name: Dahian

texts.es: A sus 20 años, el joven Dahian presta servicios de corte de cabello para hombre en una barbaría del sector de Bello localizado al norte de Medellín. Gracias a esta actividad, puede generar sus propios ingresos con los cuales apoya económicamente en su hogar y suple los gastos de sus estudios. Con el ánimo de mejorar el servicio prestado, el joven Dahian necesita de la compra de una silla para peluquería y pintar el local, lo cual generará un mejor ambiente es su negocio y podrá atraer más clientes y mejorar sus ingresos. A futuro el joven Dahian sueña con culminar sus estudios y posicionar su negocio.
texts.en:
Dahian is a twenty year old young man who works giving haircuts to men in a barber shop in the neighborhood of Bello which is north of Medellin. 

Thanks to his work he can earn his own income which helps him economically with his home expenses and for his education costs. With the aim of improving the provided service, Dahian needs to buy a chair for his barber shop and paint for the facility, which will generate a better environment for his business and he will be able to attract more customers and increase his income. 

In the future the young Dahian dreams of finishing his studies and forging ahead in his business.

loans.use: to buy a chair and paint for his barber shop

loans.name: Luis Albeiro

texts.es: El señor Luis Albeiro actualmente se dedica a vender papas fritas en un carrito y ejercer las labores como oficial de construcción. Con ambos trabajos ha podido sacar adelante a su esposa y a sus 5 hijos, algunos de los cuales no han culminado sus estudios. A sus 49 años, el señor Luis Albeiro desea comprar un carro para la venta de helados (copitos de nieve) de modo que pueda diversificar sus ventas y aumentar su clientela, y así poder cumplir su sueño de terminar de brindarle la educación a sus hijos.
texts.en: Señor Luis Albeiro currently sells French fries from a cart and works as a building official. The income from both activities enabled him to bring progress to his wife and their five children, some of whom have not yet completed their studies. At the age of 49, Luis Albeiro wants to buy a cart to sell ice cream ("snowflakes"), thus diversifying his sales and expanding his customer base. He will be able to fulfill his dream of having his children educated until graduation.

loans.use: to buy a cart to sell ice cream ("snowflakes").

loans.name: Ivon Maritza

texts.es: A sus 19 años, la joven Ivon Maritza tiene un almacén en el cual vende variedades como ropa para dama y caballero, accesorios y juguetes. Gracias a este negocio puede apoyar a sus padres y generar sus propios ingresos. Con el ánimo de mejorar su surtido y ventas para la temporada de fin de año, la joven Ivon Maritza necesita de la compra de mercancía tal como prendas de vestir que le permitan cumplir su meta. El sueño de la joven Ivon Maritza es terminar sus estudios y posicionar su almacén.
texts.en: A sus 19 años, la joven Ivon Maritza tiene un almacén en el cual vende variedades como ropa para dama y caballero, accesorios y juguetes. Gracias a este negocio puede apoyar a sus padres y generar sus propios ingresos. Con el ánimo de mejorar su surtido y ventas para la temporada de fin de año, la joven Ivon Maritza necesita de la compra de mercancía tal como prendas de vestir que le permitan cumplir su meta. El sueño de la joven Ivon Maritza es terminar sus estudios y posicionar su almacén.

loans.use: To buy clothes for man and women.

loans.name: Carlos Enrique

texts.es: A sus 41 años, el señor Carlos Enrique se dedica a la venta de ropa interior masculina y femenina, gracias a esta actividad consigue su sustento diario y puede brindarle a su hijo de 9 años su educación y alimentación. Con el ánimo de mejorar sus ventas y ofrecer a sus clientes nuevo surtido, el señor Carlos Enrique necesita de la compra de surtido con el cual pueda cumplir su objetivo y a la largo plazo cumplir su sueño de tener su propio almacén de venta de ropa y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo.
texts.en:
At the age of 41, Carlos Enrique sells men’s and women’s underwear.  Thanks to this activity he’s able to earn daily sustenance and provide his 9-year-old son with food and schooling. 

Aiming at improving sales and providing new stock to his customers, Carlos Enrique needs to buy an assortment with which to reach this goal and in the long run reach his dream of having his own clothing store and providing his son with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy assorted underwear for men and for women.

loans.name: Yudeivis Andres

texts.es: Yudeivis Andres es un joven de 21 años emprendedor del municipio de Caucasia, al norte del departamento de Antioquia. Actualmente se dedica a la reparación, mantenimiento y venta de repuestos de equipos celulares, actividad que aprendió gracias a que sus amigos ya la realizaban y el les ayudaba en su tiempo libre. Ahora, Yudeivis Andres ha montado su propio negocio en donde realiza todas las reparaciones, mantenimientos y la venta de repuestos para los equipos celulares de su municipio. Sueña con poder lograr que su negocio se consolide como el mas grande negocio de su clase en el municipio y poder así, brindarle a su mama la mejor calidad de vida posible, y que el tenga un futuro asegurado con una estabilidad económica; para esto, requiere de la compra de repuestos, equipos y accesorios que incrementen su oferta hacia los clientes y puedan ver en el negocio de Yudeivis Andres el mejor negocio de su municipio.
texts.en:
Yudeivis Andres is a young entrepreneur who is 21 years of age and from the town of Caucasia, which is to the north of the Department of Antioquia. He currently repairs and maintains cellular phones, but he also sells parts. Yudeivis Andres learned this business by helping his friends in this spare time. Now he has established his own business where he performs all types of repair work, maintenance, and sales of cellular phone equipment throughout town. His dream is to consolidate his business so that it can become the largest of its kind in town. This will enable him to provide his mother the best quality of life possible and assure himself of financial stability in the future.

For this reason, he is requesting to buy spare parts, equipment, and accessories so that he can increase the services that he offers to his customers. Yudeivis Andres would like to see his business become the best in town.

loans.use: to buy spare parts, equipment, and accessories for mobile phones.

loans.name: Munkhbat

texts.en: Munkhbat, 22, runs a taxi around the districts of Ulaanbaatar city, the capital city of Mongolia. He lives with his wife and son in the slum district of Ulaanbaatar. His monthly earning is not enough for his family's necessities. He earns approximately USD 25-30 in a day, depending on the season. He has been running his business for three years and his father practiced him initially. Now he needs to renovate his taxi car for better quality service. As he said, it will help to improve his business and increase his earnings. He will repair and renovate his car in January by himself. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to purchasing spare parts for his car renovation.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts for his car renovation.

loans.name: Erdenebayar

texts.en: Mr. Erdenebayar, 27, is a military man. He lives with his family in the suburban district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He is requesting a loan to purchase building materials for his apartment renovation. He has just moved to the new apartment and needs to make some renovation to it. In addition, he plans to install an electric furnace in his living room. As he said, it is very beneficial and economical for heating. After the installation of the furnace, he can reduce his monthly cost for heating by approximately 20-25%.

loans.use: To purchase building materials for his apartment renovation.

loans.name: Ochirpurev

texts.en:
Mr. Ochirpurev, 33, owns a mini truck and transports wood between markets in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been running his business for over six years and already has had some permanent partners. 

He wants to expand his business through starting in wood sales. As he said, he needs to purchase large amounts of wood from the suppliers in the market for building the working capital. 

Ochirpurev is requesting a $2,900 loan; $2,000 will be spent to purchase the wood and the remaining $900 will be dedicated to making renovations to his transportation truck.

loans.use: To make renovations to his transportation truck and to purchase a large amount of wood for starting a second business.

loans.name: Wbernel De Jesús

texts.es: El señor Wbernel a sus 38 años, se dedica a la venta de mercancía en el municipio de la Ceja al oriente de Antioquia, actividad que aprendió desde los 18 años cuando se encontraba radicado en el Valle del Cauca. Actualmente se encuentra vendiendo libros de material didáctico como matemáticas, ingles, entre otros. El señor Wbernel tiene una hija de 6 años, por la cual todos los días trabaja fuertemente, pues le quiere brindar una buena educación y estabilidad económica en un futuro. Sueña con que su negocio crezca y sus ventas aumenten, por lo que requiere de la compra de mercancía para afrontar la temporada donde sus ventas aumentan considerablemente.
texts.en:
Sr. Wbernel, age 38, sells merchandise in the town of La Ceja which is east of Antioquia. He learned this business 18 years ago when he lived in Valle del Cauca. Wbernel currently sells educational textbooks about mathematics, English, and other subjects. He has a six-year-old daughter, so he works hard every day because he wants to provide her a good education and financial stability in the future.

Wbernel dreams of growing his business and increasing his sales. Therefore, he is requesting to buy merchandise so that he will be stocked for the season when his sales increase considerably.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en: Emmanuel is a 27-year old young man living in a semi-permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His current business is motorcycle transportation which he has been operating for the last four years. He started with farming where he raised money to buy a motorcycle. His challenges are seasonal weather and high fuel and transportation costs. His dream is to build a permanent home and buying two more motorcycles for transport business. Emmanuel needs the loan to buy another motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Francis is a resident of Mariakani, Kenya. He was introduced to Milango by his friends and joined the group in order to access credit. 

He is applying for a loan of 40,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to purchase household items like basins, cooking utensils, etc.

His main challenges are the high cost of products and transport. He will use the extra income to pay for school fees.

loans.use: to purchase household items like basins, cooking utensils etc.

loans.name: Kenneth

texts.en:
Kenneth is 54 years old and married to Sarah and  they have three children. He has been in the motor vehicle spares    retail shop, selling motor vehicle spare parts and fixing defects for the last 11 years from which he earns a monthly income of Kes 40,000.

He is applying for his fifth loan of Kes 100,000.He repaid for his previous loan well and in good time. He was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer. He plans to use the funds to buy stock of motor auto spare parts for his hope.

His dreams are to become an auto spares distributor and also open motor vehicle garage, and educate his children.

loans.use: To buy auto spares stock

loans.name: Tareq

texts.en: Tareq, who is a 34-year-old young man, is a father for one son and two daughters. He is a worker with a decent salary. Tareq has built a new house and wants to do some finishing, such as installing tiles, installing windows and doors, painting, etc. Because he has a decent salary, but which is not enough to cover his family needs and to pay the expenses to finish his house, he needs to take a loan from FATEN in the amount of $2,000. Getting this loan will enable Tareq to pay the expenses needed to finish and prepare his house to live in with his family, that will offer to the family better living conditions. Tareq is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To pay the expenses to finish his house.

loans.name: Jose Absalon

texts.es: El señor José Absalon siempre se ha resaltado por ser un hombre trabajador que quiere brindar la mejor calidad de vida a su esposa y sus 3 hijos. A la edad de 53 años, el señor José Absalon consigue sus ingresos gracias al trabajo en el billar y la salsamentaria que posee. Sueña con poder ofrecer mas productos a sus clientes y adecuar el lugar de manera agradable. Es por esto que el señor Jose Absalon requiere de la compra de mercancía para su surtido como licor, abarrotes, entre otros y la adecuación de su negocio para atraer a mas clientes y poder generar mayores ingresos para su hogar.
texts.en:
José has always been a hard-working man.  He wants to give his wife and three children a better quality of life.

José, age 53, gets his income thanks to his work in the billiard business and the delicatessen that he has.

He dreams of being able to offer his customers more products and of adapting the place in a pleasing way.

That is why José Absalon needs to buy merchandise to stock his business.  He will buy things like liquor and groceries, among other items.  He will also refurbish his business in order to attract more customers and to be able to generate more income for his household.

loans.use: to buy groceries and liquor for his business and to refurbish his location.

loans.name: Dyana

texts.en:
Dyana is a 30-year-old married woman from Marka, Amman, Jordan. She is the mother of three children.

Dyana sells clothes and she is requesting a loan of 700 JOD to purchase clothing for trading purposes.

Due to cultural issues, Dyana's husband is shown in the photo.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for trading purposes.

loans.name: Nadiah

texts.en:
Nadiah is a 42-year-old married woman from Al Nasser, Amman, Jordan. She is the mother of three children.

Nadiah sells clothes from her home and she is requesting a loan of 700 JOD to purchase more clothes for trading purposes.

Nadiah is looking to increase her capital and open a shop for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes for trading purposes.

loans.name: Rana

texts.en:
Rana is a 28-year-old married woman from al Nasser, Amman, Jordan. She is the mother of two children.

Rana sells clothes and she is requesting a loan of 1,500 JOD to to purchase clothes for trading purposes.

Rana is looking to open a shop for her business with an aspiration of purchasing her own house and car.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for trading purposes.

loans.name: Osama

texts.en:
Osama is a 31-year-old married man from Marka, Amman, Jordan. He is the father of two children.

Osama has a water distribution business in which he sells sterilized water.

Osama is requesting  a loan of 1,500 JOD to expand his business by purchasing bottles and some other things.

Osama is looking to improve his business and open another branch for his shop.

loans.use: to expand his business by purchasing bottles and some other things.

loans.name: Blanca Nubia

texts.es: A sus 48 años, la señora Blanca trabaja en una tienda ubicada dentro de una escuela de la ciudad de Medellín en una jornada de lunes a viernes de 6:00 a.m a 6:00 p.m. Con esta actividad puede generar el sustento para su familia y dos hijos de 19 y 15 años. Con el ánimo de mejorar su surtido y ofrecer nuevos productos, la señora Blanca necesita de la compra de un congelador con el cual pueda vender helados y mejorar sus ingresos. El sueño de la señora Blanca en tener su propio restaurante y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Blanca is 48 years old and works in a store which is located inside a school, in the city of Medellín.  She works from Monday to Friday, from 6.00am to 6.00pm.  Through her business, she is able to provide for her family and her two children who are 19 and 15 years old.  With the aim of improving her stock and offering new products, Blanca needs to buy a freezer which she can use to sell ice creams and improve her income.  Blanca's dream is to own her own restaurant and to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a freezer

loans.name: Fernando Leon

texts.es: Dedicación es la palabra con la que mejor se puede describir a Fernando León. Este hombre a sus 44 años, debe hacer el papel de padre y madre para su hijo, pues esta abandonó el hogar hace un tiempo. Dedicado a su legumbrería, Fernando León a podido generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar, y su sueño es que su negocio crezca mucho más para poder brindarle a su hijo todas las necesidades que requiere.
texts.en: 'Dedication' is the word which best describes Fernando León.  At 44 years of age, this man must play the role of both father and mother to his son as his wife left them some time ago.  Dedicated to his vegetable business, Fernando León has been able to make the income he needs to provide for his household.  His dream is for his business to grow a lot more so that he can provide his son with everything he needs.

loans.use: to buy vegetables wholesale

loans.name: Abbas

texts.en: Abbas is a 28-year-old Lebanese man. He’s single, living with his parents and one relative. Despite his young age, life’s difficulties obliged him to work under pressure to be able to cover the heavy costs of life. He opened his own shoe and bag shop for women in 2008, and has gained a fair number of clients so far. Today, he’s asking for a loan of $3,000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to increase his inventory of shoes. He notes that as much as he diversifies his products, his returns will be just as high. In the future, he plans to start selling men's and children's shoes.

loans.use: to increase his inventory of shoes.

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en: Mohamad is a 36-year-old Lebanese man. He lives with his wife and their three children who are still studying at school. He’s working really hard to be able to offer a respectable life to his children. And after being a car mechanic for ten years, he opened his own garage in 2005. So far, he has gained a fair number of customers asking for his services. Today, he needs to borrow $1,800 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase additional car spare parts for his business. He notes that this will allow him to earn superior income. In the future, he plans to open his own car showroom.

loans.use: to purchase additional car spare parts for his business.

loans.name: Samer

texts.en: Samer is a 26-year-old Lebanese man. He lives with his wife and their two children who are still attending school. He’s the main source of income in the family and has many responsibilities. He has seven years of experience as a van driver. In 2007, he decided to have his own van. He works on a freelance basis depending on his customers’ requests. Today, he’s asking to borrow $2,100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to perform necessary maintenance on his van and change its wheels.  That way, he will be secure in his transportation and keep his customers safe. In the future, he plans to expand his business by buying a bigger van with an additional number of passenger seats.

loans.use: to perform necessary maintenance on his van and change its wheels.

loans.name: Abdel Latif

texts.en: Abdel Latif is a 27-year-old single Lebanese man. He lives with his one parent and three siblings. One of his siblings is in school and two others are working. He cooperates with his siblings to satisfy the family needs. Abdel Latif started his work as a constructor in 2007; he works independently on a freelance basis and looks forward to taking on more projects. Today, he’s requesting to borrow 1,700 USD from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase wood for his business. This loan will improve his work and, therefore, his standard of living. In the future, he plans to accept bigger construction projects.

loans.use: to purchase wood

loans.name: Jamoliddin

texts.ru: Джамолиддин женат и имеет двоих детей. Жена занимается торговлей на местном рынке, где продает женские сумки. Год назад Джамолиддин начал заниматься предоставлением услуги такси по местному маршруту. Он хочет хорошо обслуживать своих клиентов, чтобы им было комфортно и удобно в его машине. Данный момент Джамолиддин нуждается в ремонт машины и хотел бы получить займ чтобы купить запчастей. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Jamoliddin is married and has two children. His wife works with trade at the local market, where she sells handbags. A year ago Jamoliddin started a taxi service with local routes. He wants to serve his customers well, and make it comfortable and convenient for them in his car. 

Currently Jamoliddin needs to repair his car and would like to receive a loan in order to buy spare parts. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy spare parts and repair his car

loans.name: Henry

texts.en:
Henry is a resident of Kitale, Western Kenya and has been in farming for 12 consecutive years. He currently employs one farmhand. His farm produces maize and beans which he sells locally. He also runs a general retail shop in the local market to get additional income.

Henry has requested a loan of 85,000 KES from Kiva partner Juhudi Kilimo to buy a motorcycle for a transport business venture. He says the business will support his farming whose income has become unpredictable with fluctuations in the prices of farm produce. He hopes to build the business and buy a motor vehicle for the same business.

He reiterates that his major problems are the harsh weather conditions and poor prices for farm produce.

Henry is married with three children aged between 16 and 13, all of whom are in school.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle for his transport business.

loans.name: Rabieh

texts.en:
Rabieh is a 29-year-old woman from Aqaba, Jordan. 

Rabieh is selling home products and she is operating from her home; she is requestig a laon of 800 Jordanian Dinar (JOD) to purchase more home products for trading purposes. 

Rabieh is looking to open a store at her home for her business with nice decorations so that she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase more home products for trading purposes

loans.name: Wedad

texts.en:
Wedad is a 43-year-old married woman from Sahab, Amman, Jordan and a mother of four children. 

Wedad is requesting a loan of 499 Jordanian Dinar (JOD) to purchase more cleaning products for trading purposes. 

Wedad is looking to improve her family's living conditions and improve their standards. 

Due to cultural issues Wedad's husband appears in the photo in her place.

loans.use: To purchase more cleaning products for trading purposes

loans.name: Sammy

texts.en:
Sammy is 26 years old and married to Teresia, who is a business lady. He supports three members of the family. He has been in the motorcycle business for three years and earns a monthly income of KES 16,000.

He is borrowing a loan of KES 93,000, which he plans to use to purchase a motorbike. He will use the anticipated profit from the business to invest back into the business.

This is his first loan. His hopes and dreams are to educate his children and grow the business at the same time.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es: Reina Isabel de cuarenta y cuatro años de edad vive con su compañero de vida en casa propia. Ella posee una venta de carteras y otros artículos varios, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha más clientela pues su producto es de muy buena calidad y a excelentes precios, las personas siempre encuentran en el negocio lo que buscan; Reina es una mujer muy trabajadora con mucho entusiasmo de salir adelante y cumplir todos sus sueños, piensa que si lo puedes soñar, lo puedes lograr y con ese pensamiento positivo es como se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar carteras de todos tamaños, juguetes y otros artículos. Reina Isabel tiene la esperanza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Reina Isabel is 44 and lives with her common-law husband in their own house.  She sells purses and other articles for a living.  Lately her customer base has increased because of her very good quality and excellent prices.  People always find what they are looking for at her place.  Reina is a hard worker who is very enthusiastic about getting ahead and reaching her goals.  She believes that if you can dream of something you can achieve it, so with that positive way of thinking she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy purses in different sizes, toys and other items.  Reina Isabel hopes she can give her family a better lifestyle this way.

loans.use: To buy purses and toys.

loans.name: José Fredys

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 40 años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos de 8, 5 y 3 años cada uno.

Él junto con su esposa tienen dos años de administrar su propia tienda, desde que es pastor evangélico, antes don José se dedicaba a realizar trabajos agrícolas. Los productos se los llegan a dejar hasta su casa. Por lo que don José solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar: 15 chimbos de gas propano a la semana, fríjol, arroz por quintales y jabón por cajas y también leche.

Con el préstamo él comprara productos que no tiene disponibles y comprara más de los que ya tiene, al mismo tiempo los podrá comprar a mejor precio ya que antes tenia esa limitante, a la vez les ofrecerá mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes, por lo que venderá más y obtendrá mejores ingresos. Don José espera tener una tienda más grande, ya que en su comunidad habitan más de 800 personas, y tienen que viajar hasta 12 kilómetros para comprar lo que no encuentran en su tienda. Por lo que él,  ha visto un mercado bastante amplio en su comunidad y es por lo que solicita el préstamo para abastecer de todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
José is 40 years old and lives with his wife and his three children who are 8, 5 and 3 years old each.  He and his wife have been running their own store for two years since he’s been an evangelical pastor.  He used to work in farming.  The products are delivered to him at home.  José is asking Fundación Campo for a loan to buy: 15 tanks of propane gas per week, beans, rice by the quintal, soap by the case and also milk.

With the loan he will buy products that he does not have in stock and will buy more of those he does have.  At the same time he will be able to buy at a better price since he used to have to limit himself.  Concurrently, he will offer a better variety of products to his customers so will sell more and obtain better income.

José hopes to have a larger store because there are more than 800 inhabitants in his community and they have to travel up to 12 kilometers to buy whatever they don’t find in his store so he sees quite a large market available in his community and this is why he requests the loan to stock up on everything needed.

loans.use: to buy 15 tanks of propane per week, beans and rice by the quintal, soap by the case and milk.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim, a 27-year-old Lebanese single man, lives with his parents and one sibling. His father takes care of the family and covers their expenses.

With 10 years of experience as car mechanic, Ibrahim has specialized in car electrical repairs since 2006 and is now requesting a loan of $3000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a new scanning machine for his business. He notes that this will allow him to carry on his work in a proper way. In the future, he plans to enlarge his garage in order to serve more customers.

loans.use: to purchase a new scanning machine for his business.

loans.name: Jhon Jairo

texts.es: El señor Jhon Jairo se ha dedicado desde hace ya bastante tiempo a la pezca artesanal, actividad con la cual genera los ingresos para sostener a su esposa y sus 2 hijos. Debido a que Jhon Jairo debe remar para poder dirigirse a pescar, gasta mas tiempo del debido en su trabajo y por esto su producción es muy reducida, es por esto que Jhon Jairo busca la manera de acceder a un motor fuera de borda el cual le permita desplazarse con mayor facilidad y en menor tiempo, de modo que podrá recorrer mayores trayectos y pescar mayor cantidad de su producto.
texts.en: Jhon Jairo is a dedicated man who has been doing artisanal fishing for some time now, an activity that generates income to support his wife and his two children.  Because Jhon Jairo must row out to fish, he spends more time than necessary at work and his production is reduced because of this.  For this reason, Jhon Jairo is looking for a way to acquire an outboard motor that will allow him to move more easily and in a shorter amount of time so that he can travel across greater distances and fish larger amounts of product.

loans.use: to buy an outboard engine.

loans.name: Nelci Del Socorro

texts.es: A sus 37 años, la señora Nelci se dedica a la venta de productos de papelería, juguetería y ropa desde un pequeño almacén ubicado en la sala de su casa. Desde hace tres años gracias a su negocio puede generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar compuesto por su esposo y dos hijos. Con el ánimo de mejorar sus ventas, la señora Nelci necesita de la compra de surtido en artículos de papelería, juguetería y ropa con los cuales pueda mejorar su surtido e ingresos y a futuro cumplir su sueño tener su propio almacén en un local de un centro comercial y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Nelci, 37, has a business selling stationery goods, toys and clothing from a small store located in the living room of her house.  For three years, thanks to his business, she has been able to generate the income she needs to support her household, which is comprised of her husband and two children.  With the objective of increasing her sales, Nelci needs to buy more stationery goods, toys and clothing, so that she can increase her inventory and her income.  In the future, she wants to achieve her dream of having her own store in a shopping center, and improving the quality of life of her family.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of stationery goods, women's clothing and toys

loans.name: Luz Adriana

texts.es: La señora Luz Adriana se ha caracterizado por ser una mujer trabajadora y luchadora que busca que sus 2 hijos y su esposo tengan la mejor calidad de vida posible. Luz Adriana se encuentra dedicada desde hace algún tiempo a la venta de mercancía por catálogos en su municipio, actividad con la cual ha podido sostener los gastos de su hogar. Luz Adriana sueña con poder brindarles la mejor educación posible a sus hijos y con montar un almacén que permita dejarle una estabilidad económica a sus hijos en un futuro.
texts.en:
Luz Adriana is a hard-working and go-getting woman who wants her two children and husband to have the best possible life.

Luz Adriana has been working for some time in the selling of catalogue merchandise in her area, this activity has given her the means to pay her household expenses. 

Luz Adriana dreams of being able to provide the best possible education for her children and building a shop that allows her to leave her children an economically stable future.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and shelving.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en: Michael is a 42-year-old Lebanese single man living with his parents and one relative. Like every man of his age, Michael is looking to have his own family and kids. For this reason, he decided to open his own business. In 1991, he opened a snack bar in his town where people meet and enjoy eating. He’s well known for his good food and good reputation. Today, he’s requesting a loan of $1800 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a new refrigerator for his business. With a refrigerator, he can keep the food safe and gain his customer’s trust. In the future, he plans to open his own restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase a new refrigerator for his business

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is a resident of Mombasa, Kenya. He is married and has two children, though only one has joined school. He sells second hand clothes in the area. This business has been in operation for five years. Besides this, Simon also owns a taxi and runs a salon business.
Simon is applying for a loan of Ksh 80,000 to buy babies' and men’s wear. The additional income obtained will enable Simon make developments in his other businesses.

loans.use: To buy babies' and men’s wear

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Julio César es un joven de 26 años dedicado a su trabajo, por el cual les brinda el sostenimiento a sus 2 hijos. Julio César se dedica a la venta de ropa y sus principales clientes son sus amigos y familia, de esto genera los ingresos necesarios para sostener sus gastos. Con el ánimo de poder brindarle a sus hijos la educación que requieren, Julio Cesar aspira a poder montar su propia tienda, donde se incrementen sus ventas y sea reconocido en su municipio por la calidad de sus productos.
texts.en: Julio César is a 26-year-old man who is dedicated to his work through which he supports his two children.  Julio César sells clothes and his main customers are his friends and family.  From this he generates income necessary to cover his expenses.  Aiming to provide his children with the education they need, Julio César hopes to open his own store where sales will increase and he will be known in his town for the quality of his products.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Luis Alfonso

texts.es: Luis vive en la ciudad de Cartagena de Indias, donde tiene su propio restaurante de comida oriental. A sus 26 años decidió emprender su propia aventura de negocios, aprovechando la experiencia de su madre, quien trabaja en un restaurante y es experta preparando este tipo de comidas. Su idea de negocio surgió con la necesidad de apoyar el bienestar de su familia;  y aunque el restaurante ha tenido muy buena acogida, porque no tiene competencia en el sector y es una gran novedad para los habitantes de esta zona, la infraestructura no es suficiente para generar un ambiente totalmente confortable. Igualmente sus compras rotan muy rápidamente, porque compra en pequeñas cantidades. Todo esto le plante a Luis el desafío de acceder a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar alimentos no perecederos en mayor cantidad, con el fin de ahorrar costos y comprar mas barato por hacerlo de contado. Con su credikiva comprará mesas y sillas, así como insumos y materias primas no perecederas para responder a la necesidad planteada.
texts.en:
Luis lives in the city of Cartagena de Indias, where he has his own oriental food restaurant. At 26 years old, he decided to embark on his own business adventure, making the most of the experience of his mother, who works in a restaurant and is an expert at preparing this type of food.

His business idea came from the need to attend to the well-being of his family. 

Although the restaurant has been well received, because he has no competition in this sector and it is a great novelty for the residents of the area, the infrastructure is not enough to create a totally comfortable atmosphere. Also, his stocks run out very quickly, because he buys small quantities. 

All this sets Luis the challenge of accessing his kiva loan, the first funding that he gets from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, in order to buy wholesale non-perishable foods, with the end goal of saving on costs and paying less by paying in cash. With his kiva loan, he will buy tables and chairs, so that ingredients and raw materials won't perish in order to respond to the need that has arisen.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs, so that ingredients and raw materials don't perish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock to start the business.

loans.name: Alba Isabel

texts.es: Alba, se decidió a un nuevo crédito para seguir fortaleciendo su negocio de productos de primera necesidad y surtirlo más como azúcar, frijoles, sardinas, arroz, aceite, sopas instantáneas para tener variedad y mejoren las ganancias cada dia.Los prestamos le han ayudado, creció el negocio y han mejorado sus ventas y de las ganancias le ayuda a su familia en alimentación diaria.
texts.en: Alba seeks a new loan in order to continue building up her business selling basic staples and stocking it with more sugar, beans, sardines, rice, cooking oil and soap powder in order to have variety and improve her daily income.  Her loans have helped the business grow, have improved her sales and earnings, and helped her family’s daily nutrition

loans.use: to purchase sugar, beans, sardines, rice, cooking oil and soap powder.

loans.name: Philip

texts.en:
Philip is 32 years old. He is single and he supports two people. He has been in the transportation business for three years, with a monthly income from the business of 16,000 Kenyan shillings (KES).

He is borrowing a loan of KES 93,000 with which he intends to purchase a motorbike. He plans to expand his business with the anticipated profit from the business.

This is his second loan, and he successfully paid his previous loan. His hopes and dreams are to purchase a pick-up.

loans.use: To  buy a  motorbike.

loans.name: Sabir

texts.ru: Etot molodoy chelovek uje 2 qoda kak rabotayet taxistom. Etomu biznessu yego nauchil starshiy brat. Taxi Sabira isportilos i yemu nujno kupit noviye zapchasti dlya togo chtobi pochinit yeyo, poeotmu seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN. On jenat i imeyet 2 detey. Sabir jivet v Baku regione vmeste svoyey lubimoy jenoy i detmi. On rodilsya v 1985 qodu.
texts.en: This young man has been working as a taxi driver for two years. He learned from his older brother. Sabira's taxi broke and he needs to buy some auto parts in order to fix it, which is why he needs 2000 AZN. He is married and has two children. Sabir lives in the Baku region with his lovely wife and children. He was born in 1985.

loans.use: Purchase auto parts

loans.name: Menfis Elizabeth

texts.es: Menfis Elizabeth de cincuenta y ocho años de edad vive con su hijo. Ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, últimamente se ha hecho de mas clientela ya que su tienda es muy conocida en la zona porque siempre tiene lo que las personas buscan, además todo lo que comercia es de excelente calidad con precios accesibles; Menfis es una mujer amable, emprendedora, dispuesta totalmente a estar adelante de su competencia satisfaciendo todas las necesidades de los clientes,tiene muchas metas por cumplir, ella piensa que los propósitos y las acciones nos llevan al carácter y ese carácter determina nuestro destino, quiere un buen destino por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar bebidas, granos básicos, aceites, embutidos, producto instantáneo, golosinas etc. Menfis Elizabeth tiene fe que de esta forma podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Menfis Elizabeth is 58 years old and lives with her son. She has a store where she sells basic necessity products. Lately she has had more customers because her store is well-known in the area and she has what people want. In addition, her merchandise is of excellent quality and offered at an affordable price. Menfis is a friendly and enterprising woman who is fully prepared to stay ahead of the competition by satisfying all of her customers’ needs. She has many goals that she wants to accomplish.

Menfis believes that the intentions and actions of a person can shape one’s character and that character determines one’s destiny. She wants to have a favorable destiny, so she decided to request a loan from Apoyo Integral in order to buy beverages, basic grains, oil, cured meats, instant products, candy, and other items. Menfis Elizableth has faith that she can provide her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy beverages, basic grains, oil, cured meats, instant products, candy, and other items.

loans.name: Abraham

texts.en: Abraham is a 28-year-old married man living in a semi-permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His current business is motorcycle transportation where he takes 50 percent of the earnings to his boss at the end of the day. His challenge is high fuel and transportation costs and seasonal weather. His dream is to educate his children and to buy his own motorcycle. Abraham needs the loan to buy his own motorcycle for a transport business.

loans.use: to buy his own motorcycle for a transport business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Husnia

texts.en:
Husnia is a 40-year-old lady who works with her husband in their small grocery market to support their five sons and daughters. Two of them have their own jobs and also help their parents financially as much as they can.

After her husband Abd Alghani retired from the military, he dedicated his time to staying by his wife’s side in their 1-year-old business. They were able to fill the market with the basic and most demanded products, but now they want to add another section to sell home products and for that reason Husnia has applied for this loan.

Because Husnia is a conservative person, she asked her husband Abd Alghani to appear in the photo instead of her.

loans.use: to add another section for selling home products.

loans.name: Marwa

texts.en:
Marwa is a 24-year-old married lady who has three kids to support with the help of her husband, Omar, who works as water leak technician.
 
Marwa recently started a small retail business selling mobile phones. At first she started to take orders from her customers and look for the requested mobile phone in the market to avoid the risk of losing money, but now she has brought a small collection of the most requested type of mobile phones to keep at home whenever someone comes to ask to buy a phone.

Marwa is looking to bring in more types of phones and add selling prepaid mobile phone cards to her services, and that’s why she has applied for this loan.

Because Marwa is a conservative person, she has asked her husband Omar to appear in the photo instead.

loans.use: to bring in more types of phones and add selling prepaid mobile phone cards.

loans.name: Gegham

texts.en: Gegham lives in Artashat with his wife, daughter, and parents. He runs a little shop in Mkhchyan village and a grocery store in Artashat. He has applied for this loan to invest in his businesses. He plans to increase the inventory in the shop and to purchase food for the grocery. He hopes the loan will enable him to increase sales and earn additional income, which will help him to expand his businesses in the future.

loans.use: to purchase food for the grocery store and clothing and household goods for the shop

loans.name: Nibal

texts.en:
She is a conservative woman and her son Hassan, for whom she is taking out this loan, is pictured here at the FATEN branch. Nibal is 56 years old and the mother of two sons and one daughter. One of Nibal's sons earns a decent salary working at a telecommunication company and her other son wants to start a business selling clothes. This business will allow him to become independent and help increase the family's income by adding another source of income. 

Nibal wants to help her son start his business and is requesting a loan from FATEN to cover expenses such as purchasing a new collection of clothes to sell and installing shelves, lights, and other items. Her loan will enable Nibal to help her son to pay for these expenses and prepare the store well for opening which will help her son to establish his future right and livelihood.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shelves, lights, and other items to open a business

loans.name: Omar

texts.en:
Omar, 37, is a married man with four children, two of whom attend school while two are still young for school. He lives at a rental house that has electricity but not piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food, rent bills and electricity.

For the past three years, he has operated a boda boda (motorcycle) transportation business. His potential customers are neighbors and town dwellers. He faces a major challenge in the high cost of purchasing fuel for transport. 

With the KES 80,000, he wants to purchase a tuk tuk, a three-wheeled motorcycle taxi. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

Omar dreams of operating a matatu (minibus) in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a tuk tuk, a three-wheeled motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Grigor

texts.en: Grigor earns his living by repairing and trading in mobile phones and accessories. The current income from the business is barely enough for Grigor and his family to cover their costs. Thus, Grigor would like to develop the retail side. With the requested loan, Grigor plans to purchase mobile phones and accessories to sell. This will allow Grigor to increase the business income and insure a better future for his family. Grigor lives together with his parents.

loans.use: to pay for mobile phones and accessories.

loans.name: Jihad

texts.en: Jihad is 20 years old, single and earns a living by selling beverages such as tea, coffee and orange and lemon juice. He carries these beverages in a large copper jug and sells most of his drinks at weddings and other big events. He would like to expand his business because the demand for his products is high. He is applying for this loan to buy additional jugs because this will allow him to increase sales, improve his living conditions and enjoy a more promising future. In the photo we see Jihad with a jug on his back.

loans.use: to buy more jugs for holding beverages.

loans.name: Abdelqader

texts.en: AbdelQader is an 18-year-old young, single man. For 2 years, he has had a project leasing chairs and tables for occasions such as weddings. AbdelQader wants to increase the number of chairs and tables he has in order to expand his project and satisfy his customers' needs, but the amount of money he has isn't enough to pay and cover all these purchases. So he needs to take a loan from FATEN. Getting this loan will enable AbdelQader to purchase an additional number of chairs and tables. That will increase demand on leasing them for his customers' occasions and so increase his income which will offer to him better standards of living. AbdelQader is photographed in the picture next to the chairs he is using for leasing.

loans.use: to purchase more chairs and tables for leasing

loans.name: Abdelhafeeth

texts.en: Abdelhafeeth is 43 years old, married and the father of one son and three daughters, all of whom are in school. He earns a living as an accountant working for a private company where he earns a salary which is decent but not enough to cover all of his family's needs. He is applying for a loan for $1,000 from FATEN and Kiva to buy some furniture his family needs to improve its living conditions.

loans.use: to buy some furniture his family needs.

loans.name: Mostafa

texts.en: Mostafa is a 48 year-old man. He is married and a father of eight sons. One of them is a Palestinian National Authority employee with a decent salary. Mostafa is a taxi driver with low income.  He wants to make necessary repairs to his taxi, such as changing the engine, changing the tires, etc.  He needs to take a loan of $3,000 from FATEN to pay for these expenses.  Repairing the taxi will affect his work positively and will allow him to work extra hours and take more internal and external requests.  That will enable Mostafa to create better living conditions for his family.  Mostafa is photographed next to his taxi.

loans.use: To make necessary repairs to his taxi.

loans.name: Haneen

texts.en:
Haneen is a conservative woman, so her husband Firas is photographed instead in FATEN branch. 

Haneen is a 26-year-old young woman. She is married and a mother for one son and two daughters. Her husband is a blacksmith with low income. Haneen wants to purchase new home furniture such as bedroom furniture for her children, living room seats, dinning room furniture, etc. to offer to her family their needs for furniture to live in better and comfortable home conditions. Haneen needs to take a loan from FATEN for 2,000 USD since her husband's low income isn't enough to cover all these purchases. When Haneen gets the loan, she will be able to purchase all the family needs for furniture, so she will satisfy her family needs and offer to them better home living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase new home furniture

loans.name: Andrew

texts.en:
Andrew is 55 years old and married. He lives in a permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His current business is distilling the local brew, which he has been doing for the last 20 years.He started by producing one jerrycan but now he produces seven jerrycans. 

Andrew is requesting a loan, which he will use to prepare land for growing maize. His challenges are price fluctuations and inflation. Andrew's dreams are to educate his children, hire employees to help expand his business, and buy land to grow crops.

loans.use: to prepare land for growing maize.

loans.name: Khachatur

texts.en: Khachatur is engaged in farming. Unable to find sufficient financial resources to expand his farm, Khachatur has applied for a loan. With the requested loan, Khachatur plans to purchase livestock.
